thread.title: Iroquois Hotel is delightful!
thread.title_full: Iroquois Hotel is delightful! - Review of The Iroquois New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 505joanneg
title: Iroquois Hotel is delightful!
text:
I highly recommend it for location,value and service!
The only comment I have is that The Triomphe restaurant breakfast price is ridiculously high!
Cafe Boulud is next door and phenomenal!
I truly enjoyed the staff and the little morning coffee library with the WSJ and NYT!
